author: PFCal-dev
body:
This version of the digitizer contains the ganging of the SimHit DetIds complying with the changes made for SLHC14 by @bsunanda and some new features.
I tested with runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 12200 and found no problems in step2 just in the harvest step:
"1 1 1 0 tests passed, 0 0 0 1 failed"

Is there a chance that this can still make it for SLHC14? Otherwise the RecHits for HGC will have wrong DetId assignments.

@vandreev11, @amagnan follow this as well
title: Hgc digigeom
